name: The Amazing Game 3.0 (Akadream)
description:
Hello everybody !

My name is Akadream and I'm one of the 3 developer who created this game in 72h during our first Ludum Dare. It's an amazing game, so play it :D

I've made this game with djeycreations and odd, so thanks to them and see ya for the Ludum Dare. ^^

The concept is to caricature the bad behaviour of video game editors about casualisation and monetization. 99% Home made assets !

Have fun ;)

Softwares I've used :  Unity, LMMS, Affinity Designer, Bfxr
